message: A big Tweeten update is here!
new: Tweeten is now fully responsive and works beautifully even when you make the window narrow.
Replaced TweetDeck's new rounded UI with the classic Tweeten square UI.
User columns now show the user’s profile picture on the navigation instead of an icon.
You can now display profile pictures for each column on the navigation.
Tweeten can now automagically detect when it’s off-screen, and reposition itself.
Always On Top mode now notifies you when it's enabled/disabled.
Tweeten's Settings window now automagically repositions itself when it's off-screen, or partially cut off.
Lots of minor UI fixes throughout the app.
